list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: Fuel tanks shall be provided with a fluid level indicator.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: Fuel tanks shall be protected against corrosion, be fixed to the machine and be incorporated in such a way that they are protected against mechanical damage (for example by placing the fuel tank within the rigid structure of the machine).

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: Non-metallic fuel tanks shall comply with ISO 21507.

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: Metallic fuel tanks shall comply with the pressurization and spill requirements of ISO 21507.
